history.content:
Dear EECS Faculty, Staff, and Students, 

On behalf of the EECS Chairs, we are pleased to announce the call for nominations for the 2017 EECS Heroes Program that is designed to recognize excellent performance by non-academic (both represented and unrepresented) staff members in the Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences.  The call for nominations will be made once a year during the Fall semester. Each award will be accompanied by a certificate and a gift card.

  • Nominations for these awards will be accepted from faculty, staff and students
  • Nominations should consist of a few sentences that describe the nominee’s exceptional contribution to the department (i.e., service, resourcefulness, dedication, or any other quality that you think should be recognized).
  • Nominees must be EECS staff members (to ensure your nominee is eligible, we have provided links of all eligible EECS staff members 1.Eligible EECS Administrative Staff, 
               2.Eligible Staff from IDSG/CUSG, ISG, and ACG Units .
  • Nominations will be evaluated by the EECS Chairs, and the EECS Heroes Program Coordinator.
  • Individuals can nominate more than one person.  
  • Nominees are only allowed to win this award once a year.

The deadline to submit email nominations to Jenny Jones (jennyj@eecs.berkeley.edu) for Fall 2017 awards is November 22, 2017.  
 Email nominations must be submitted with the following subject: EECS Heroes Nomination.

We are very excited to have this program and sincerely hope that you will join in and take a minute to recognize those who do great work for the department!

If you have any questions, please contact me.
 
Best,
Jenny
history.subject: EECS Heroes Nominations

history.content:
Dear EECS Faculty, Staff, and Students, 

On behalf of the EECS Chairs, we are pleased to announce the call for nominations for the 2017 EECS Heroes Program that is designed to recognize excellent performance by non-academic (both represented and unrepresented) staff members in the Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences.  The call for nominations will be made once a year during the Fall semester. Each award will be accompanied by a certificate and a gift card.

  • Nominations for these awards will be accepted from faculty, staff and students
  • Nominations should consist of a few sentences that describe the nominee’s exceptional contribution to the department (i.e., service, resourcefulness, dedication, or any other quality that you think should be recognized).
  • Nominees must be EECS staff members (to ensure your nominee is eligible, we have provided links of all eligible EECS staff members 1.Eligible EECS Administrative Staff, 
               2.Eligible Staff from IDSG/CUSG, ISG, and ACG Units .
  • Nominations will be evaluated by the EECS Chairs, and the EECS Heroes Program Coordinator.
  • Individuals can nominate more than one person.  
  • Nominees are only allowed to win this award once a year.

The deadline to submit email nominations to Jenny Jones (jennyj@eecs.berkeley.edu) for Fall 2017 awards is November 22, 2017.  
 
Email nominations must be submitted with the following subject: EECS Heroes Nomination.

The award announcement for Fall 2017 will be made at the EECS Winter Celebration. 

We are very excited to have this program and sincerely hope that you will join in and take a minute to recognize those who do great work for the department!

If you have any questions, please contact me.
 
Best,
Jenny
